AUTHOR: OutKick
CONTENT: On Friday, Target announced it would only sell its Pride Month collection in "select stores" next month. The company cited the backlash it received one year ago for the change.

AUTHOR: The Christian Post
CONTENT: Target continues to face backlash over its Pride-themed clothing line that includes a “tuck-friendly” swimsuit and products created by a brand that designs apparel and other items promoting satanic imagery. #Target #boycott #genderidentity #LGBT #pridemonth

AUTHOR: Lila Rose
CONTENT: EVIL: Target is selling "chest-binders" and "tuck-friendly" bathing suits and pride gear for children. Children deserve to have their innocence protected, not sabotaged. Children suffering with gender identity disorder need care and support, not products that push the self-harm of gender ideology.

AUTHOR: Lila Rose
CONTENT: I haven’t shopped at Target for almost a year, and many of my friends haven’t, either. Their promotion of dangerous gender ideology to children is unacceptable. Don’t keep patronizing businesses that hate your values, right to your face.
